pullRequest.title: fix entity remove order of operations
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes MekHQ Issue 2233, although the actual issue would happen whenever there's a situation where you have "lance movement" on for any unit type, and remove a unit during the deployment phase instead of deploying it while having less units left than the "lance size".
The problem was that the "endMyTurn" function was trying to get a count of the remaining vehicles but it was off by one because the vehicle hadn't been removed from the game yet.
Also cleared out an unnecessary methodBegin/End call for the bot.

commit.message: fix entity remove order of operations
